entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
